planner_edit_plan: Brighten and replace the dim porch light fixture with a visibly lit, modern LED-style wall lamp.
critic_notes: The porch light on the left brick wall was changed to a brighter, visibly lit fixture and the added glow looks plausible for the scene. The edit appears localized to the porch light area with no noticeable changes to camera/viewpoint, global color/lighting, or surrounding objects. If a more 'modern LED-style wall lamp' is required, the fixture shape could be made more contemporary (clean rectangular/sconce design) while keeping the same placement and localized illumination.

planner_edit_plan: Repair the damaged corrugated metal roof by replacing the broken, bent sheets with intact matching panels.
critic_notes: The corrugated roof appears repaired: the previously bent/broken sheets are replaced with intact, uniformly aligned corrugated panels consistent with the sceneâ€™s perspective and lighting. No obvious changes to surrounding buildings, wires, walls, or camera viewpoint/color balance. If anything, ensure the new panels retain some weathering/age to better match the rest of the structure, but the edit is plausible and localized.

planner_edit_plan: Remove the barbed wire coils from the top of the wall.
critic_notes: The barbed wire was not removed; it remains visible along the top of the wall. The scene otherwise appears consistent with no major viewpoint or lighting drift. To satisfy the edit plan, cleanly inpaint/erase the wire coils across the entire wall top (including distant sections) while preserving the wall edge, sky, and background details.

planner_edit_plan: Repaint the faded white crosswalk stripes to be bright, solid, and clearly visible.
critic_notes: The edit does not match the plan: instead of repainting existing faded crosswalk stripes near the intersection, it adds multiple long, perfectly straight, high-contrast white bands extending far down the road (more like lane markings). The markings ignore road wear/perspective blending and look composited. To fix: locate the actual crosswalk area and repaint only those stripes, keeping correct crosswalk geometry (short transverse bars), consistent perspective, slight texture/edge wear, and matching scene lighting.

planner_edit_plan: Remove the piled trash so the ground area is clean.
critic_notes: The trash pile at the bottom-left/center has been removed and replaced with plausible ground texture. Surrounding wall, barbed wire, sky, and car remain consistent with no noticeable viewpoint or global color/lighting drift. Only minor smoothing/blur in the cleaned area; if desired, add a bit more pavement texture/noise to better match the original ground detail.
